document.full_text: chrysler group llc plans to repay about $7.5 billion in u.s. and canadian government loans on may 24 to strengthen the automaker's financial position, a person familiar with the matter said on wednesday.
document.title: chrysler to repay government loans on may 24
lines_and_colors: chrysler group llc plans to repay about $7.5 billion in u.s. and canadian government loans on may 24 to strengthen the automaker's financial position, a person familiar with the matter said on wednesday.
